From: Seetharam Samptur <ssamptur@...>

Hi,
      I'm using Junit for the first time and was experimenting it by writing
test cases to test a Queue class. The methods in the Queue class are
blocking on a queue. For ex: the get() method invokes wait() if the queue is
empty. When a different thread invokes put() method and populates the queue,
the get method is signaled and it returns the value.
How can I test such a scenario? 

Also, I would appreciate if you can send me some links or pointers to
documents describing on how to use Junit to test multithreaded programs.

Thanks
Ram
subject: Testing blocking methods..
